attributes.action: Make Nerdfighter a official english word
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The term nerdfighter (N) was made up by the two orginal nerd fighters ( hank and john green from brotherhood 2.0 ) nerdfighter means someone who is a nerd or slightly unpopular who will stand up and belive in themself with all their awesome

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
